form.label: EX - Analysis
form.description: Analysis Dashboard for FireEye EX Events

search.query: eventtype=fe product="Email MPS" $wild$ | lookup acknotes id as id | eval Ack=if(isnull('alert.ack'),"",'alert.ack') | search Ack=* | eval file_hash=if(isnull('file_hash'),"",'file_hash')|eval malware_url=if(isnull('malware_url'),"",'malware_url') | sort -occurred | table Ack, id, signature, severity, occurred, subject, suser, duser, file_hash,malware_url | rename id AS ID, signature AS Malware, severity AS Severity, occurred AS Occurred, duser AS Recipient, subject AS Subject, suser AS Sender, file_hash AS "Md5sum" ,malware_url AS "URL"

eventtype=fe product="Email MPS" id=$ID$ $wild$ | lookup acknotes id as id | eval file_hash=if(isnull('file_hash'),"",'file_hash')|eval malware_url=if(isnull('malware_url'),"",'malware_url') | eval Notes=if(isnull('Notes'), "Empty", 'Notes') | table id, Notes, file_hash,malware_url , ext_ref | rename id as ID, Notes as "Event Notes", ext_ref AS "Event Link" file_hash AS "Md5sum" ,malware_url AS "URL"

eventtype=fe product="Email MPS" $wild$ | stats count(duser), count(file_hash), count(malware_url), max(signature), max(occurred) by duser | rename duser AS Recipient, count(duser) as "Total Malicious Email", count(file_hash) AS "Attachment", count(malware_url) AS URL, max(signature) AS "Last Malware", max(occurred) AS "Last Seen at (UTC)"

eventtype=fe product="Email MPS" $wild$ | stats dc(duser), count(duser), count(file_hash), count(malware_url), max(signature), max(occurred) by suser | rename suser AS Sender, dc(duser) AS "Unique Recipient", count(duser) as "Total Malicious Email", count(file_hash) AS "Attachment", count(malware_url) AS URL, max(signature) AS "Last Malware", max(occurred) AS "Last Seen at (UTC)"
